description: Master index of all system prompts, defining their ID, file path, default model for execution, and fallback model for resilience and cost control.

prompts.description: Universal parser, normalizer, and compiler for raw threads, pages, and documents, extracting structured entities.
End-to-end personal/business/system strategist, generating goals, plans, and roadmaps based on context.
Generates structured product ideas (MVP, production, enterprise) from ingested market data and trends.
